allProducts.name: Emerson Bar Chair

specifications: 18in L x 18in W x 25in H · Chair extends to 30inch H

allProducts.description: Industrial vintage bar stool with polished steel base with a wooden seat and back.
reviews: rev1
rev2

allProducts.name: Industrial Storage Coffee Table
allProducts.description: Lofted on airy steel legs, our Industrial Storage Coffee Table's top pops up to reveal a boatload of hidden storage.
specifications: Overall product dimensions: 36in W x 26in D x 17.75in H (25in H when open)
Interior compartment: 32in W x 22in D x 6.5in H

allProducts.name: Metalwork 6-Drawer Dresser - Hot-Rolled Steel Finish
allProducts.description: Finished in hot-rolled steel for a cool, industrial edge, our Metalwork Dresser is one of our all-time favorites—and with its clean lines and simple proportions, it's easy to see why.
specifications: Metal in a Hot-Rolled Steel finish.
reviews: rev4
rev5

allProducts.name: Massaro Metal-Wrapped 6-Drawer Dresser - Hot-Rolled Steel
allProducts.description: With its low profile, clean lines and industrial-inspired metal case, our handsome Massaro Dresser feels rustic and refined all at once. We finished off its minimalist form in a cool gray-brown Umber finish—one of our favorites for the season.
specifications: Oak veneer over solid wood drawers in an Umber finish.
Metal case and hardware in a Hot-Rolled Steel finish.
reviews: rev6

allProducts.name: Logan Platform Bed - Smoked Brown
allProducts.description: Made of solid wood, re-sawing and rough-hewing give our Logan Collection its rugged good looks. The process makes each piece subtly one-of-a-kind.
specifications: Queen: 73in w x 87.5in d x 48.2in h.
Solid acacia wood in a Smoked Brown finish
reviews: rev7

allProducts.name: Faceted Stone Table Lamp
allProducts.description: The geometric sides of our Faceted Stone Table Lamp are carved into black soapstone. Topped with a crisp white shade, its polished look works well in rooms modern and traditional alike.
specifications: Accommodates a 13W CFL bulb (included) or 60W incandescent bulb (not included).
reviews: Love this table lamp!
Wish this came as a white base, but the black stone is still stunning. Happy with my purchase.

allProducts.name: Industrial Task Table Lamp + USB
allProducts.description: Our Industrial Task Table Lamps fuse form and function, swiveling and adjusting to direct light wherever it’s needed. A USB port at its base makes it a great spot to charge your phone.
specifications: Adjustable arm locks at two angles.
Does the job.  What can I say?
reviews: Great task lamp and look.
Looks great at my breakfast bar. Purchasing two more!

allProducts.name: Bontok Theatre Floor Lamp
allProducts.description: Oversized metal shape is inspired by old lamps from places like factories and theaters.
reviews: Yay, light in my living room!
Not what I expected.  Nice lamp, but will be returning.

allProducts.name: Sol Duvet Cover
allProducts.description: Ultra soft duvet cover made from 100% Certified Organic Cotton.

allProducts.name: Hemmed Sheet Set
allProducts.description: These cool, soft & breathable sateen sheets will create that home away from home experience.

allProducts.name: Quilted Madison Sham
allProducts.description: Made from an extra-fine weave microfiber, the modern quilted design offers texture and style to your décor. The sham is wrinkle-resistant and easy to wash, allowing your bed to look picture perfect every day.
reviews: This sham is a sham!
Found these to be as nice as described - beautiful, very soft and high quality, accurate color depiction. Luxurious feel.

allProducts.name: Mediteranean Bath Towels - Set of 4
allProducts.description: Turkish bath towels from Coyuchi are super-absorbent, woven for maximum moisture-wicking potential. With proper care, these premium, pampering picks will last you for years.
specifications: Traditional lightweight Turkish bath towels with a high/low weave for excellent absorption.
Cotton is 100% organic, and sourced and woven in Turkey.
reviews: It took me a while to get used to the idea that a thinner towel could be as absorbent as a thick or plush towel but once I got my head around that, I was hooked. I was given a beach towel from a friend and although I would not normally travel with my own towel, I'm absolutely sure I would make room in my bag for this one. It's practical & beautiful for any sunny holiday!
Clean beautiful design.

allProducts.name: Warmest Throw – Yarn Dyed
allProducts.description: Woven with fun, fringed edges, our Warmest Throw is a cozy classic.
reviews: Super soft!!
Got as a gift and I love it!

allProducts.name: Symmetry Objects
allProducts.description: More than meets the eye. These optical sculptures feature geometric twists and turns, for a multidimensional display.

allProducts.name: Boos Edge-Grain Rectangular Cutting Board, Walnut
allProducts.description: An exceptionally hard cutting board provides a stable work surface and also helps protect finely honed blades. Sturdy construction – with the edge grain creating the work surface – gives this board a commercial-quality toughness to withstand years of use.
specifications: Crafted in the USA from sustainably harvested North American walnut.
Edge-grain construction holds up to years of slicing and chopping.
reviews: Purchased it as a gift and he loved it!
Beautiful cutting board. I almost don't want to use it.

allProducts.name: Enclume Sig Steel & Tigerwood Chef's Rack
allProducts.description: The beautiful striped markings of Brazilian tigerwood add warmth to this wall-mount hammered-steel rack.

allProducts.name: KitchenAid 4 oz. Blade Coffee Grinder
allProducts.description: Features a blade grinding mechanism that rapidly and easily grinds with minimal noise level. It offers easy fingertip control and 1 - 4 cup versatile brew cycle function.
specifications: Bowl, blade and top are dishwasher safe; Wipe exterior clean.
reviews: The KitchenAid Blade Coffee Grinder is very easy to use and clean. It will always grind your coffee to your liking.

allProducts.name: Peralta Full Dinnerware Set, Chez Panisse Line - Set for 2

allProducts.description: The simple look of bare wire branches makes a great wall decoration to any room.

allProducts.name: Consigned Greenish Gray Farmhouse Area Rug
allProducts.description: This rug is very special and hard to find such a pattern. These over-dyed rugs are all made of hand knotted vintage Turkish rugs. But each rugs' reaction to dying process is changing due to threads used in the past. This is what makes these rugs all special.

allProducts.description: Make a bold statement with this unique Hitchcock Rectangular Cocktail Table. Featuring a stunning design and beautiful color, this cocktail table is ideal for gatherings with friends, displaying accent trays, or even kicking up your feet to relax.

allReviews.review: Great bed. Solid construction and beautifully designed. The fabirc easily cleans and extremely soft to the touch. I've been getting much better sleep and feel better than ever!

allReviews.title: Nice design but not very bright
allReviews.review: The lighting shade material is very thick and covers alot of the light being transmitted. This makes for a low amount of light even after we tried ultra white light bulbs. Looks great but not very bright.

allReviews.title: Elegant nightstand
allReviews.review: Recieved this as a gift and love how elegant it looks. Puts a smile on my face every morning I wake up to it.

allReviews.title: Thin rug
allReviews.review: We expected a bit thicker rug for the price. So thin some of the fabric material is starting to rub off after 4-5 months of light traffic. Wouldn't buy this rug again.

allReviews.title: Cracked after one hot summer day...
allReviews.review: Summers can get very hot here in Texas, my husband and I went on vacation and when we came back the heat must have cracked the mirror glass.

allReviews.title: Versatile & Sturdy.
allReviews.review: These lamps are well made and sturdy. The style is so versatile that they could fit in a variety of decorating themes. The light that shines through the shade is warm and comforting.

allReviews.title: As advertised.
allReviews.review: These lamps are just as advertised and work perfectly on my sofa table. Only issue was that one of the top finials is a bit crooked, but thats something not many would actually notice. They look like much more expensive lamps.

allReviews.title: Excellent Quality.
allReviews.review: These lamps are of excellent quality and make a beautiful addition to our living room. I have already had so many compliments from family and friends.

allReviews.title: Love em!
allReviews.review: This pair of whitewashed wooden lamps fit my design theme and make great bedside lamps. They seem sturdy and the shades arrived without any dents pie creases.

allReviews.title: Quality can be better.
allReviews.review: I love the table wood is good but it seems to peel easily, so you have to take very good care of it but it is beautiful and can go with anything! So happy i purchased it.

allReviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!
allReviews.review: Table looks BETTER than pictured. We are simply in love with it. Quality is fantastic. Wood really looks reclaimed. Awesome finish... not 'shiny' as appears in the pic. We couldn't be happier.

allReviews.title: Buyer BEWARE!!
allReviews.review: This table splinters in chunks. It is very poor quality.

allReviews.title: Great for the price.
allReviews.review: Great looking table for the price. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy and made well.

allReviews.title: Just what I wanted.
allReviews.review: Love this table. Was easy to assemble and looks fabulous in my family room. Just what I wanted.

allReviews.title: Piece of cake.
allReviews.review: Piece of cake to mount and was the perfect addition to my small kitchen in our log cabin..
